Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCPRM2 WHERE IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY PROYCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_ITCPRM2 ( ITCDPRM2CODI, PROYCODI, TRANSFORMADOR, TIPO, FASES, NDVN, VNP, VNS, VNT, PNP, PNS, PNT, TCCPS, TCCST, TCCTP, PCUPS, PCUST, PCUTP, PFE, IVACIO, GRPCNX, TAPTIPO, TAPLADO, TAPDV, TAPMIN, TAPCNT, TAPMAX, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :ITCDPRM2CODI, :PROYCODI, :TRANSFORMADOR, :TIPO, :FASES, :NDVN, :VNP, :VNS, :VNT, :PNP, :PNS, :PNT, :TCCPS, :TCCST, :TCCTP, :PCUPS, :PCUST, :PCUTP, :PFE, :IVACIO, :GRPCNX, :TAPTIPO, :TAPLADO, :TAPDV, :TAPMIN, :TAPCNT, :TAPMAX, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_ITCPRM2 SET PROYCODI = :PROYCODI, TRANSFORMADOR = :TRANSFORMADOR, TIPO = :TIPO, FASES = :FASES, NDVN = :NDVN, VNP = :VNP, VNS = :VNS, VNT = :VNT, PNP = :PNP, PNS = :PNS, PNT = :PNT, TCCPS = :TCCPS, TCCST = :TCCST, TCCTP = :TCCTP, PCUPS = :PCUPS, PCUST = :PCUST, PCUTP = :PCUTP, PFE = :PFE, IVACIO = :IVACIO, GRPCNX = :GRPCNX, TAPTIPO = :TAPTIPO, TAPLADO = :TAPLADO, TAPDV = :TAPDV, TAPMIN = :TAPMIN, TAPCNT = :TAPCNT, TAPMAX = :TAPMAX, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE ITCDPRM2CODI = :ITCDPRM2CODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCPRM2 ORDER BY ITCDPRM2CODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_ITCPRM2 SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = '0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCPRM2 WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY ITCDPRM2CODI ASC
